participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, Alex is passionate about storytelling through art.
participant_1.background: I love comics. I've started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers. I decided to publish my creations on the internet. I've been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this. And also love drawing.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and supportive, Jordan enjoys sharing her passions with others and has a keen interest in art.
participant_2.background: I love meat. I have a new job selling cars. I love to paint pictures. My wife used to be a teacher.

content.text: I love comics.
Me too! I love to read them and I also love to draw them.
That's great! I've started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
That's awesome! What kind of comics do you create?
I create all kinds of comics, but I mainly focus on superhero comics.
That's cool! I've always been a fan of superhero comics.
Me too! I love the way they can be used to tell any kind of story.
I agree! They're so versatile.
I've been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this.
I'm sorry to hear that. But don't give up! I'm sure you'll find someone who will publish your comics.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll keep trying.
I'm sure you'll be successful.
I hope so!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a student.
Oh, what are you studying?
I'm studying business.
That's cool! What do you want to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. But I'm interested in marketing.
That's a good field. There are a lot of opportunities there.
Yeah, I think so too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, draw, and play video games.
That's cool! I like to read, paint, and play video games too.
Oh, that's cool! We should play video games sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always looking for new people to play with.
